tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SecurityEvents (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_type TEXT,
    event_date TIMESTAMP,
    event_description TEXT,
    event_source TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE SecurityBreachData (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  breach_type VARCHAR(100),
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE FalseAlarmData (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  alarm_type VARCHAR(100),
  details TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE SecurityIncidents (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_type VARCHAR(100),
  description TEXT,
  severity INT,
  date_occurred DATE
)

CREATE TABLE AlarmHistory (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  alarm_type VARCHAR(100),
  date DATE,
  details TEXT,
  status VARCHAR(50)
)
